text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following item specifications and item name information.

Item name:
CafePress - Con Abuela - Natural Canvas Tote Bag, Cloth Shopping Bag

Item specifications:
Professionally printed, thousands of designs to choose from.
Small measures 15"x15" with 26.5" sturdy reinforced fabric handles
Medium features full side & bottom support gussets, measures 15"x18"x6" with 22" reinforced fabric handle
Make this shopping tote your new favorite grocery bag, library tote, or beach tote. These bags are also great gifts for him or her, teachers or students, young or old, for any occasion.
Machine wash cold inside out with like colors and tumble dry low for easy and convenient care. IMPORTED.
We offer 100% money back guarantee, so you can buy with confidence. Your satisfaction is our promise, and returns/exchanges are made easy.

Product description:
text.Response A: This stylish natural canvas tote bag is perfect for carrying your groceries, books, beach gear, and more! The sturdy construction and reinforced handles make it durable and reliable, while the stylish design will make you stand out from the crowd. This tote bag is also a great gift for friends and family, and comes in a variety of designs to suit any taste.
text.Response B: CafePress brings your passions to life with the perfect item for every occasion. With thousands of designs to choose from, you are certain to find the unique item you've been seeking. Travel in style with this cloth tote bag, professionally printed with your favorite design. Made with sturdy fabric, this natural canvas hand bag is durable and functional with a 26.5" reinforced fabric handle and a small 15"x15" size that is perfect for all your essentials. And with CafePress, your satisfaction is always our promise...buy with confidence, as we offer easy returns and exchanges and a 100% money back guarantee.

meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.

Prompt

You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following item specifications and item name information.

Item name:

Medium features full side & bottom support gussets, measures 15"x18"x6" with 22" reinforced fabric handle
Make this shopping tote your new favorite grocery bag, library tote, or beach tote. These bags are also great gifts for him or her, teachers or students, young or old, for any occasion.
Machine wash cold inside out with like colors and tumble dry low for easy and convenient care. IMPORTED.
We offer 100% money back guarantee, so you can buy with confidence. Your satisfaction is our promise, and returns/exchanges are made easy.

Product description:

Response A

This stylish natural canvas tote bag is perfect for carrying your groceries, books, beach gear, and more! The sturdy construction and reinforced handles make it durable and reliable, while the stylish design will make you stand out from the crowd. This tote bag is also a great gift for friends and family, and comes in a variety of designs to suit any taste.

Response B

CafePress brings your passions to life with the perfect item for every occasion. With thousands of designs to choose from, you are certain to find the unique item you've been seeking. Travel in style with this cloth tote bag, professionally printed with your favorite design. Made with sturdy fabric, this natural canvas hand bag is durable and functional with a 26.5" reinforced fabric handle and a small 15"x15" size that is perfect for all your essentials. And with CafePress, your satisfaction is always our promise...buy with confidence, as we offer easy returns and exchanges and a 100% money back guarantee.
